casebody.data:
ACKLEY et al., Plaintiffs, v. READING TRUST CO., Defendant. (Supreme Court, General Term, First Department. May 18, 1894.) Action by J. Edward Ackley and another against the Reading Trust Company.

Argued before VAN BRUNT, P. J., and FOLLETT and PARKER, JJ.

R. Foster, for plaintiffs. G. S. Coleman, for defendant

No opinion. Exceptions overruled, and judgment ordered on verdict, with costs.
